name: Formene
description:
Formene is an open world RPG game in low poly style. 

Explore the vast open world and find the mysteries of the world. The game take place after the "AmbientWorld" but the storyline is not directly related to it. The mechanics like enemy, quest, inventory will be added in future updates.

Note: I'm working alone in this game so updates may take time and its still in early development stage, so there will be bugs.

Controls:

  • W/A/S/D: Walk
  • Left Click: Draw Arrow
  • Left Alt: Show Mouse Cursor
  • Left Shift/Right Click: Sprint
  • Esc: Menu

Tested On:

  • RAM: 16 GB
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Vega 8 Graphics
  • Space Required: 708 MB

Tips:

  • There is one teleport waypoint, marked as blue square in map.
  • Press Z to enable ragdoll

Install Instruction:

  • Extract the Formene.rar and
  • Run Formene.exe
  • Enjoy !!!

~ During game development I realised that developing game is not just randomly placing rocks and trees and it's not just shot arrow and player will shot arrow.
